qrList.label: Auto-Impersonate TTS
qrList.message:
// * Auto-Impersonate - Impersonates {{user}} and triggers {{char}} to respond to it. Loops x times.

Directions:  Set loop number below in options.  Default: 30

If using TTS, remove one (/) from "setvar key=ttsActive " in options below.  
Default values:
TTS on - 430         TTS off - 50
************************* |

// *** Options *** |
/setvar key=loopCount 30 |
/setvar key=ttsActive true |

// ***Script start *** |
/flushvar inp |
/flushvar msgsent |
/flushvar lastmsg | 
/setinput |
/if left=ttsActive right=true rule=eq else="/setvar key=ttsDelay 50" "/setvar key=ttsDelay 430" |
/times {{getvar::loopCount}} {: 

    /if left=generatingimg right=true rule=eq {:
         //echo waiting on image generation...|
         /while left=generatingimg right=true rule=eq guard=off
                        {:
                             /delay .1 |
                        :} |
    :} |

    /setvar key=msgsent false |
 
    /imp |
    /while left=msgsent right=false rule=eq guard=off {:
            /delay .1 |
                 /if  left=msgsent right=false rule=eq 
                 {:
                    /if left={{input}} right="" rule=neq 
                    {:
                        /setvar key=inp {{input}} |
                        /setvar key=msgsent sending |
                        /delay 200 |
                        /setinput |
                        /send {{getvar::inp}} |
                        
                        /setvar key=lastmsg {{lastMessage}} |

                        /wordcount {{getvar::lastmsg}} |
                        /setvar key=wcount {{pipe}} |
                        /mul {{getvar::wcount}} {{getvar::ttsDelay}} |
                        /setvar key=delayLength {{pipe}} |
                        /delay {{getvar::delayLength}} |

                        /setvar key=lastmsg {{lastMessage}} |
                        /trigger |

                         /while left=lastmsg right={{lastMessage}} rule=eq guard=off
                        {:
                             /delay .1 |
                              /if left=lastmsg right={{lastMessage}} rule=neq {:
                                     /setvar key=lastmsg "" |
                              :}
                        :} |

                        /setvar key=lastmsg {{lastMessage}} |

                        /wordcount {{getvar::lastmsg}} |
                        /setvar key=wcount {{pipe}} |
                        /mul {{getvar::wcount}} {{getvar::ttsDelay}} |
                        /setvar key=delayLength {{pipe}} |
                        /delay {{getvar::delayLength}}
                            
                    :}
               :}
    :} |

    /flushvar inp |
    /flushvar msgsent |
    /flushvar lastmsg

:} |

/flushvar loopCount|
/flushvar ttsDelay |
/flushvar ttsActive

qrList.label: Auto-Impersonate
qrList.message:
// * Auto-Impersonate - Impersonates {{user}} and triggers {{char}} to respond to it. Loops x times.

Directions:  Set loop number below in options.  Default: 30

TTS on - 430         TTS off - 50
************************* |

// *** Options *** |
/setvar key=loopCount 30 |
//setvar key=ttsActive true |

// ***Script start *** |
/flushvar inp |
/flushvar msgsent |
/flushvar lastmsg | 
/setinput |
/if left=ttsActive right=true rule=eq else="/setvar key=ttsDelay 50" "/setvar key=ttsDelay 430" |
/times {{getvar::loopCount}} {:

         /while left=generatingimg right=true rule=eq guard=off
                        {:

                        :} |
    :} |

    /while left=msgsent right=false rule=eq guard=off {:
            /delay .1 |

                    {:

                        /setvar key=msgsent sending |
                        /delay 200 |
                        /setinput |
                        /send {{getvar::inp}} |
                        
                        /setvar key=lastmsg {{lastMessage}} |

                        /wordcount {{getvar::lastmsg}} |
                        /setvar key=wcount {{pipe}} |
                        /mul {{getvar::wcount}} {{getvar::ttsDelay}} |
                        /setvar key=delayLength {{pipe}} |
                        /delay {{getvar::delayLength}} |

                        /setvar key=lastmsg {{lastMessage}} |

                              /if left=lastmsg right={{lastMessage}} rule=neq {:

                              :}
                        :} |

                        /setvar key=lastmsg {{lastMessage}} |

                        /wordcount {{getvar::lastmsg}} |
                        /setvar key=wcount {{pipe}} |
                        /mul {{getvar::wcount}} {{getvar::ttsDelay}} |

    /flushvar msgsent |
    /flushvar lastmsg

:} |

/flushvar loopCount|
/flushvar ttsDelay |
/flushvar ttsActive

qrList.label: Impersonate once
qrList.message:
// * Impersonate once - Impersonates {{user}} and triggers {{char}} to respond.
************************* |

// ***Script start *** |
/flushvar inp |
/flushvar msgsent |
/flushvar lastmsg | 
/setinput |

    /if left=generatingimg right=true rule=eq {:
         /echo waiting on image generation...|
         /while left=generatingimg right=true rule=eq guard=off
                        {:
                             /delay .1 |
                        :} |
    :} |

    /setvar key=msgsent false |
 
    /imp |
    /while left=msgsent right=false rule=eq guard=off {:
            /delay .1 |
                 /if  left=msgsent right=false rule=eq 
                 {:
                    /if left={{input}} right="" rule=neq 
                    {:
                        /setvar key=inp {{input}} |
                        /setvar key=msgsent sending |
                        /delay 200 |
                        /setinput |
                        /send {{getvar::inp}} |
                        
                        /setvar key=lastmsg {{lastMessage}} |

                        /wordcount {{getvar::lastmsg}} |
                        /setvar key=wcount {{pipe}} |
                        /mul {{getvar::wcount}} 50 |
                        /setvar key=delayLength {{pipe}} |
                        //echo delaying {{getvar::delayLength}} |
                        /delay {{getvar::delayLength}} |

                        /setvar key=lastmsg {{lastMessage}} |
                        /trigger |

                         /while left=lastmsg right={{lastMessage}} rule=eq guard=off
                        {:
                             /delay .1 |
                              /if left=lastmsg right={{lastMessage}} rule=neq {:
                                     /setvar key=lastmsg "" |
                              :}
                        :} |

                        /setvar key=lastmsg {{lastMessage}} |

                        /wordcount {{getvar::lastmsg}} |
                        /setvar key=wcount {{pipe}} |
                        /mul {{getvar::wcount}} 50 |
                        /setvar key=delayLength {{pipe}} |
                        //echo delaying {{getvar::delayLength}} |
                        /delay {{getvar::delayLength}}
                            
                    :}
               :}
    :} |

/flushvar inp |
/flushvar msgsent |
/flushvar lastmsg
